mapper.select: select * from reservation where userId=#{userId} or memberList like #{userIdString}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation (userId, roomId, memberNum, memberList, startTime, endTime) values (#{userId}, #{roomId}, #{memberNum}, #{memberList}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation set userId=#{userId}, roomId=#{roomId}, memberNum=#{memberNum}, memberList=#{memberList}, startTime=#{startTime}, endTime=#{endTime} where reserveId=#{reserveId}
